meanings.definition: The state of being unsafe or lacking safety.
meanings.sent1: The unsafety of the broken bridge made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent2: The unsafety of the playground equipment led to its removal.
meanings.sent3: The unsafety of the situation was so obvious even the birds flew away.
meanings.sent4: The unsafety of the old house was like a dark cloud hanging over the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The unsafety of the forest at night felt like a looming threat.

meanings.definition: The condition of being at risk or in danger.
meanings.sent1: The unsafety of the icy road caused many accidents.
meanings.sent2: The unsafety of the storm made everyone seek shelter.
meanings.sent3: The unsafety of the prank was evident when it backfired.
meanings.sent4: The unsafety of the situation was a red flag for everyone involved.
meanings.sent5: The unsafety of the wild animals roaming freely was a constant concern.
